messages.subject: Re: deschooling WAS ADD
messages.msgSnippet: **I just have this desire to make him whole again, and I don t know if that s a reasonable or attainable goal.** **Just give it time and peace and love.
messages.messageBody:
**I just have this desire to make him "whole" again, and I don't know if
that's a reasonable or attainable goal.**

**Just give it time and peace and love. Mush but true. The rule of thumb is
one month of deschooling per one year of school. Some recover in a minute,
some take a couple of years.**

And some may never fully recover. Some kids are incredibly resilient, most
kids are moderately resilient, and some just aren't resilient at all. Their
wounds never quite heal true. :::shrug:::: You just have to do your best
with what you know now and not waste time regretting.

Time and peace and love. Great prescription. :)

Deborah in IL
UNSCHOOLING.COM ONLINE NEWS
http://www.unschooling.com/networking/newsletter/index.shtml
